creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: small folio, original green morocco, stamped in blind and in gilt, with the royal crest on front cover, gilt spine, a.e.g.; litho title page, dedication and presentation leaf, and 11 albumen portraits each within a litho border, and litho copyright information beneath and the litho signature of the sitter.Portraits Prince of Wales; Lyons; Newcastle; St. Germans; Robert Bruel(?); Henry Aeland; J. Teesdale(?); G. Neprey; Gardiner Engleheart; Charles G.L. Eliot; Huchir J. Bradly(?)
title: The Royal Album 1860
